meaningMnemonic: The <radical>wrap</radical> radical and the <kanji>wrap</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: Think about being <kanji>wrap</kanji>ped up, nice and warm and safe in your <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう). Home is where you wrap yourself in a blanket, in the warmth of the fireplace, in the arms of those you love.
